h3.b: 2nd Graders Learning History at the Northern Pacific Railway Museum

div.p: Wapato Public Schools mission is to prepare our students for success in the global economy.
The #1 goal is the District is to excel in student academic achievement and growth through industry leading quality instruction and the use of technology.
The Wapato High School graduation rate has been at or above 90% the past 5-years.
EVERY School Day Counts! The District strives for a 95% or better average daily student attendance rate.
Wapato Public Schools make it a priority to engage and recognize the contributions of our diverse community including parents, students, staff and stakeholders.
